TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t eɪ l ɐ æ s k h ɚ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ k dʒ iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɛ d h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔː ɹ ɪ s ɪ k s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ n ʃ s n oʊ l p iː z f aɪ f aɪ v tʃ ɪ ŋ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n d m eɪ b ɪ ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɜː b ɹ ɔː d ɚ b ɔː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɪ ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n æ s n æ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ k t ɔːɹ f ɹ ʌ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ d ə k iː z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p t iː z ə t ɪ ŋ k z n t ə t ɹ ɹ ɛ d b æ k z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɜː w ɪ d z n æ w ɪ d ɪ z ð ə æ t ð ə t ɹ eɪ n s t ʃ ə n m
